Screenshot Clothing offers surprisingly fresh, casual, and comfortable styles with excellent sizing. As a petite guy (waist 28-29, H: 5’5”), I find their small size truly fits like a small—unlike the inflated sizing often seen in American brands today.  In a market where XS has virtually disappeared, and ‘small’ now resembles a medium, Screenshot stands out by providing accurate, well-proportioned sizes that fit comfortably without the baggy, oversized feel of today’s typical Small. Beyond their unique, funky style, this brand ensures clothing feels right and fits perfectly. A HUGE fan, I only desire that I could afford more of them.

评论概述: People ALWAYS compliment anything ScreenShot I own
评论详情: I just randomly bought a hoodie from ScreenShot on a whim one day because I liked the design and when I received it, I was blown away with the quality. Right from the get go, it feels like a luxury item. The price says otherwise, which makes you do a double take. The material feels like great quality and even the packaging, makes you feel like you spent over a hundred dollars easily. I own several hoodies from them and they still look and feel great. I’m not a shill, I just felt like leaving a review like this to express how great I feel this company is. I can’t recommend them enough!
